description: Great downtown location - share this Beautiful and spacious 5 bedroom unit . All female house! Looking for for 3rd or 4th year, female students to share the space with 4 other students going into 4th year next year. GREAT LOCATION! Newer build, located just 2 km to campus, on multiple bus routes to Western and Fanshawe. Walking distance to the grocery store and to downtown restaurants and shops. Features open concept living/dining area, 5 big bedrooms all with a huge closet and big window with window blinds, TWO full bathrooms, white kitchen with breakfast bar, food pantry, pendant lighting, all appliances including dishwasher and microwave, insuite laundry. Ceramic and wood laminate flooring and custom window blinds throughout. SEE A VIRTUAL TOUR AT www.oxfordrentals.ca. TEXT l519-649-6878 or EMAIL for more information. BONUS - backs onto a beautiful park for walking, running or biking! This lease ends April 2026.
5 person house currently filled with 3 girls going into 4th year+. Each room has its own ensuite washroom with an additional half bath. 2 fridges, spacious backyard, sunroom and garage.

Looking for a calm spot to focus on your studies? Our comfy house is just right for upper-year or grad girls. It's spacious, stylish, and tucked away on a peaceful street with easy access to a bus route for Western University. We have two bedrooms up for grabs in the basement for $650 each. Lease terms are flexible. There are three free parking spots plus free WiFi. We're conveniently close to Western, Costco, restaurants, and grocery stores. Kick back in the backyard and on the deck between study sessions. No smoking, parties, or pets allowed. Interested? Shoot us a text or email with your full name.

*** OLD NORTH ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED *** 2 BED/1 BATH house on St James St & William St. updated kitchen, a short drive or bus ride to campus. Groups only. Not furnished. No room sharing. $800/room  Watch the video walkthrough here: https://youtu.be/4pd1xulY2B4  Don't miss out - apply here: https://forms.gle/JwfL5edsa2WyfyodA

Looking for two roommates to fill vacancies in our house, preferably male.



Text 6475324911

Hi! I'm looking for two female roommates to join my house! House is super close to campus (15 minute walk) and just steps outside a major bus route (2,106 and 93). Utilities are included in this price and besides the bedrooms the house is already furnished. The house is 4 bedrooms with 2.5 bathrooms.



If you're interested or have any questions, feel free to text me at (647) 297-6034 and we can set up a viewing. 



Thanks so much!

2 rooms for rent, looking for 2 female roommates to accompany 2 other female that will be in their fourth year starting from May 1st, 2025 for a 12 month lease. Rent is $950/month plus utilities (wifi, electricity, gas and water split evenly). 



This four bedroom apartment has 2 refrigerators, 2 double vanity bathrooms, central air, dishwasher, microwave and in-suite laundry room (with washer and dryer). This unit is located less than a 10 minute bus ride from main campus, have multiple bus stops minutes away and right by Oxford and Wharncliffe. NO pets or smokers, please and you can call/text Angela at 647-567-6338 or email angelactlee@yahoo.com.

Hi!



I am have two rooms available in a 3 bedroom house for a lease starting May 1, 2025. The house is minutes walking from campus. Please message if interested!



2 rooms available 

12 Month lease 

2 parking spots available 

3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house

10 minute walk to Western University campus

Address - 225 Raymond Ave

Two rooms are up for rent in the basement, each at $875, for female students at Western University only. Utilities are included in the rent. Residents will share the house with five other female students from Western, enjoying a communal living experience, a fully equipped kitchen, and laundry facilities on-site. The property is located in a quiet and safe neighborhood. The rooms will be available starting May 1, 2025, with a lease term of 12 months. The two basement bedrooms share a bathroom and are merely a 5-minute walk to UWO. A bus stop is conveniently positioned right outside the property. For more information and to schedule an in-person visit, please reach out. Texting will ensure a quicker response.

Location: Sarnia Road, North-west London

Close to Western University, Costco, Farmboy, Sobey’s, gyms, banks, retail stores, and great restaurants. Walking distance to green spaces, trails, and playgrounds. Nearby schools: Wilfrid Jury PS and Sir Frederick Banting SS.



About the Townhome:



Total: 3 bedrooms (Only 2 bedrooms available for rent, NOT the whole unit).

Large bedroom: $850/month (includes utilities) private basement bathroom..

Small bedroom: $650/month (includes utilities) shared bathroom .

Shared spaces: Bright living room, eat-in kitchen, fenced back deck, fully finished basement with recreation room, and laundry area.

Rental Details:



No smoking

Available now

12-month lease preferred

This is a great opportunity! Contact us now for more details.

FULLY FURNISHED, utilities and WIFI included! A perfect family / faculty / post-doc / grad student apartment by a highly-rated host and owner! 



All-inclusive + free wifi, free Netflix, free parking for 1 car, all utilities included. This newly-remodelled fully-furnished 2-bedroom is centrally located (1.9km to St. Joseph's hospital, 2.7km to Western), steps away from stores and bus lines. Modern NYC-inspired decor with a luxury feel. On-site laundry. No smoking. No pets. Contact: info@eurosuites.ca. Complete information: https://eurosuites.ca/

LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION! INCLUSIVE RENT! FULLY FURNISHED. Two apartments are available. Spacious, clean, bright apt. with eat-in kitchen & 4-piece bathroom. Kitchen, living room & bedrooms are nicely furnished. Each bedroom has a bed, dresser, desk & chair. Laundry & parking available. Walking distance to Cherryhill Mall with a Metro grocery, Library, Shoppers Drug Mart & 3 Banks. McDonalds & Subway restaurants nearby. Mini-mart & Pizza place at end of street. CLOSE TO UNIVERSITY CAMPUS. No car needed. Walk or take the bus. Three minutes to bus stop on Western Road. Five minutes or less to Elborn, Althouse, Huron, Law & Engineering buildings. Ideal for Physical or Occupational Therapy & Speech Pathology students. Looking for non-smoker & no pets. Females only. Individuals or group welcomed. Some apartments with A/C. Call 519-438-4958  to schedule an apartment viewing. PRIOR TO CALLING, PLEASE CHECK THE DAYS & TIMES DURING THE UPCOMING WEEK THAT YOUR ENTIRE GROUP IS AVAILABLE FOR A VIEWING. NO TEXT MESSAGES.

Hello! I am looking for 1-2 individuals to share my 3 bedroom, 3 bath townhome with! This beautiful townhome is located near Sunningdale and Richmond, in a newly developed neighbourhood. The location is approximately a 5min drive to Masonville Mall, 10 min drive to Western University and 20min drive to Fanshawe College, with several shops and plazas in the surrounding area. Bus routes are also accessible nearby! Appliances include fridge, stove, microwave, dishwasher and in-unit laundry. There is also a large balcony on the main floor- perfect for summer lounging! The rent is $1036 for 1 person (or $691 each for 2 individuals), utilities are extra. Utilities (hydro, gas, wifi) are extra, and are split between us. 1 parking spot is also available. Bedrooms are not furnished, however common spaces are. I am looking for a mature, responsible, and clean individual to join me in my home. I am a full time 3rd year student, with a part-time job, so I am generally fairly quiet, but enjoy a night out every once in a while, and hoping to find someone who is similar :) I also have a super friendly 1 year old cat named Luka, so you must be okay with cats :) No couples or other pets please! Please message if you are interested :)

Looking for 2 more students to fill a 5 bedroom house. The place is in a great location just off the Oxford and Wharncliffe intersection, right between downtown and campus. There are many shops and food places located nearby. Its about a 3 minute walk to the main bus stop with multiple bus routes directly to campus. Feel free to message if you have any questions or want more pics of the place!

Bright 2 Bedroom Unit in Wortley Village – Available June 1st or Sooner!



Looking for a spacious, well-maintained unit in the Wortley Village area? This 2-bedroom 1-bathroom unit is available for rent starting June 1st, with the opportunity for an earlier move-in if needed! Please call 226-559-3899.

2 bedroom apartment available Apr. 1st, 2025. 

Professional mature student preferred.

HUGE Luxury Home - TWO bedrooms now available in 5 bed 2.5 bath home. Large lower level rooms with their own bath and BONUS study room! Big new windows. Modern renovation with luxury finishes. AC, free laundry, parking …everything! Property backs onto river, and paths to UWO and Downtown. This is a high demand house and these rooms are currently listed below market rent given the timing.

*** 2 large bright rooms available to a group of 2 female students on the upper floor. The third room is occupied by a 5th year female student. Upper year or graduate students preferred. ***



Great location! 2 minutes walk to UWO gates and Kings College. Beautiful must see bungalow. 3 bedrooms on main floor, 3 bedrooms in bright walkout basement. The upper unit and lower unit are COMPLETELY separate. Each floor has a kitchen, laundry and a bathroom.



Pot lights throughout the house. Clean. All windows are new. Large front and back yard for enjoying and relaxation. 2 parking spots included for the upper unit. Utilities also included. 



Available from May 2025.



If interested, please email Alena at amagdolen@hotmail.com. Please indicate your year of study, area of study and tell us a bit about yourself. Alternatively, please call Alena at 416-996-6468. Thank you.

**Luxury Student Rental – Available May 1, 2025**  

This fully furnished 14th-floor condo in the sought-after Luxe London building offers floor-to-ceiling windows with breathtaking views of Ross Park. The spacious unit features two large bedrooms, each with a private ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, plus an open-concept living room with a modern kitchen, granite countertops, and stainless-steel appliances. Freshly painted and professionally cleaned, it’s move-in ready. Just a short walk to Western University and access to a private shuttle, Luxe London also offers premium amenities: a fitness gym, yoga studio, games room, study spaces, meeting rooms, a private theatre, a Starbucks, convenience store, updated laundry facilities, and a large rooftop terrace. Tenants also benefit from 24-hour security surveillance with state-of-the-art cameras throughout the building, as well as a staffed front desk available at all times for assistance.  Fully furnished unit is $2950 plus Wi-Fi and Hydro.

11 MONTH LEASE (June 1, 2025 - April 30, 2026). This small, cozy apartment in the basement of a triplex is suitable for 1 or 2 people. It has 2 bedrooms, but someone living alone can also use the second bedroom as more living space. Great location in a popular student area on a low-traffic street, walking distance to Western, and perfectly located between campus and Richmond Street nightlife. The huge grass and treed backyard is great for relaxing, has a fire pit, and parking for 2 cars. Laundry onsite. Proper egress window. Active landlords -- if something goes wrong, it will be fixed. Rent is $1400 per month plus hydro (approx $50/mo.). High-speed internet is included.



Regarding furnishings, while this is mostly an unfurnished apartment, there is one twin bed with a mattress and frame (newly purchased Sept 2024). Each room has a desk. One room has a desk chair.

Looking for a suite near Western University? Let Hazelview Properties move you! 



Hazelview Properties offers beautiful views of the forest city and UWO! Limited Suites Available!



Walking distance from UWO!! Call our leasing experts today! 



This sure isn't typical student living. These updated suites are amazingly bright, modern feeling and comfortable, making them great for entertaining, group studying, or just hanging out. There's plenty of living space and the private balconies offer great city and university views. Water and heating are included! Fully Equipped Fitness Facilities, Multi-Sport Court, Basketball Court, Yoga Studio, Dog Park, Laundry Facilities, Parking Available, On-Site Professional Management, High-Rise, Certified Rental Building, Door-to-Door Mail Service.

Perfect for mature, study-oriented student. Three rooms to select but only two rooms available. Rooms starting at $700 and up depending on size. Beautiful and spacious 3-bedroom townhouse. Utilities (cap for $80/room) and unlimited internet included. Close to grocery, library, community centre, aquatic centre, transit (multi-routes 9/10/27/31 to Western). Room furniture includes a desk, a chair, and a bed. 3 bathrooms. No partying, no overnight guests. If you are interested please confirm you are a UWO student with what year you are in, and program. Two master bedrooms available in a new townhouse in North London, perfect for students. The townhouse has free parking with a garage that holds 2 vehicles, and is five minutes walking distance to the #34 bus stop that goes directly to UWO campus. 



2 large master bedrooms are available, one on the first floor and one on the third floor. Both master bedrooms have a private bathroom.



The second floor has a spacious kitchen and common area available for all tenants. Microwave, dishwasher, stove, fridge, and and laundry machines are included. All bedrooms are furnished with double-sized bed, desk and chair.



Utilities and internet are not included, the cost is split evenly between tenants of all rooms in the unit (4 in total).



Please contact Wendy at callawayroad2021@gmail.com if interested.

Available: two rooms as of January 1, 2025.  Looking for preferably full year lease or till August 2025. 



Three male roommates: 1 PhD, 1 masters, 1 comp sci 2nd year. 



Rent $700.  Equally divided utilities which is ~$50/month.

Seeking two female roommates to share the upper level of my large home, located in a very quiet neighbourhood. Two bedrooms are available, so you'd each have your own bedroom. It's perfect for a serious graduate student, visiting academic, or international student. Each bedroom is $900/month. Shared Amenities: kitchen, living room, dining room, finished basement, bathroom with tub/shower combo. There is a large designated refrigerator for roommates to share. The bedrooms are both furnished, and have large closets. There is Internet/wifi. There is also a large driveway for parking. Close to shopping and bus to Western. Ten minutes to Springbank Park for walking/biking trails. If interested, please email me at pamkilleen@gmail.com
